text: Nasrudin was in Turkey visiting a friend. One night, they sat outside, under the starry sky. Immediately, the mule began to sound approval. Why do you do ooh! and aah!? I was admiring your sky and amazed at the mastery of the sky painters here. They've made a perfect copy of the stars we have in my homeland. FIN
title: La copia perfecta
author: nan Anónimo
